And if that's not enough, you can also expand your studio with new premium styles like Hip Hop, Drum&Bass, Techno, Movie Score, House, Metal and many more. Simply jam it out until you get the perfect sound or save your jams as projects so you can open them later for more editing. Record as many tracks as you want, share them as audio files and keep your listeners coming back from more!
